message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_XFV_MANDATORY_FIELDS
message.locale: A Fixed Amount or a Minimum and/or Maximum Amount must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_XFV_INCORRECT_FIELD_ENTRY
message.locale: A Minimum or Maximum Amount cannot be entered along with a Fixed Amount.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_FV_MAX_AMT_INVALID_ENTRY
message.locale: The Maximum Amount, %1s, entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_FV_MIN_AMT_INVALID_ENTRY
message.locale: The Minimum Amount, %1s, entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_FV_FIXED_AMT_INVALID_ENTRY
message.locale: The Fixed Amount, %1s, entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_XRV_START_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_SERVICE_START_DATE
message.locale: The provider service rate Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the provider service Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_FV_MIN_AMT_MUST_BE_GREATER_OR_EQUAL
message.locale: The Minimum Amount, %1n, must be greater than or equal to %2s.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_FV_FIXED_AMT_MUST_BE_GREATER_OR_EQUAL
message.locale: The Fixed Amount, %1n, must be greater than or equal to %2s.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_XFV_MIN_AMT_MUST_BE_LESS_OR_EQUAL_MAX_AMT
message.locale: The Minimum Amount, %1n, must be less than or equal to the Maximum Amount, %2n.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_FV_MAX_AMT_MUST_BE_GREATER
message.locale: The Maximum Amount, %1n, must be greater than %2s.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_XRV_RATE_ALREADY_EXISTS_WITH_STARTDATE
message.locale: The provider service Rate already exists from %1d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_XRV_RATE_ALREADY_EXISTS_WITH_STARTDATE_ENDDATE
message.locale: The provider service Rate already exists from %1d to %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_XFV_MIN_AMT_MUST_BE_GREATER_ZERO_MAX_AMT_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: The Minimum Amount, %1n, must be greater than 0 if maximum amount is not entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_XRV_RATE_CANNOT_BE_EDITED_INSIDE_CONTRACT
message.locale: This provider service Rate, is included in a contract, it cannot be modified here.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_XRV_RATE_CANNOT_BE_ADDED_TO_LIVE_CONTRACT
message.locale: A provider service rate cannot be added to a live contract.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_XRV_RATE_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_FROM_LIVE_CONTRACT
message.locale: A provider service rate cannot be deleted from a live contract.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_XRV_RATE_START_DATE_MUST_BE_AFTER_CONTRACT_START_DATE
message.locale: The service offering rate Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the contract Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_XRV_RATE_END_DATE_MUST_BE_BEFORE_CONTRACT_END_DATE
message.locale: The service offering rate End Date, %1d, must be on or before the contract End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_XRV_RATE_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_ALREADY_USED_FOR_PAYMENT
message.locale: Payment(s) have been made using this provider service Rate, it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACT_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_XRV_RATE_ALREADY_EXISTS_WITH_STARTDATE_ENDDATE
message.locale: The contract service rate already exists from %1d to %2d.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACT_PROVIDEROFFERINGRATE_XRV_RATE_ALREADY_EXISTS_WITH_STARTDATE
message.locale: The contract service rate already exists from %1d.
